results.description:
Women in their 20's and 30's and up are all welcome. I plan to take us to the beautiful community of Roland Park, Tuscany-Canterbury near Johns Hopkins University; take walks to free museums and maybe stop in. I am also a lover of Centennial Park in Columbia. There are many ways to get from point A to point B. In Baltimore there is much to appreciate on your journey. Optional: Playing of the board game bananagrams afterward and/or having a little bite to eat.

I practice walk/hikes myself before I post them on Meetup so I am more educated about mileage, time and the best route for the group to take. I am looking out for myself and everyone else who comes out to join me on any given day.
results.name: The Women's Baltimore and Around Town Walking Group

topics.name: Positive Black Couples who Enjoy Date Nights

results.description:
Coco Couples is the perfect group for couples looking to find/meet mutual friends together. Maybe you've had that awkward conversation where someone says " But babe, s/he and I were friends before you and I even met." ...

Or maybe, you're tired of always hanging out with his/ her friends all the time...

Or maybe, you're both in perfect harmony and just want to meet some other fabulous couples...

Whatever your reasons are, if you simply want to be around other great couples you can build and connect with, you've found the right group!

Find yourself in comfortable environments where you both meet potential friends at the same time. Everyone in this camp is spoken for, and simply looking to hang out with other great couples. Let's have some fun!
results.name: Coco Couples

results.description: We welcome all those who have a passion for IT and especially those who practice or want to practice System Administration in its many forms. We are a group of professionals in the Washington D.C/Baltimore area who enjoy discussing the latest trends, best practices, and innovations in IT and Systems Administration. We have key note speakers come to our quarterly meetings where we listen and interact with them on the latest projects and topics in IT. We also have have pizza and drinks sponsored by local businesses. All are welcome and we enjoy meeting new like minded professionals.
results.name: The Crabby Admins a Maryland Chapter of L.O.P.S.A.

results.description: For any new nurses moving to the Baltimore (or any in the area already for that matter) looking to socialize and meet up with other fun nurses! Feel free to think of any ideas and post them in the Meet Up group guys! 🏥💉💊
results.name: Nurses New to Baltimore

results.description:
This group is for everybody who wants to get their children together with other german kids or for those who would like to teach their children the german language. As parents we try to do our best to raise them bilingual. We can learn from each others experience and support each other.

Lets have lots of playdates and fun!
results.name: German Playdates

results.description: PGRC is hosting a Memorial Day club run in Bowie with a breakfast social gathering afterwards.  We'll meet at Freestate Mall in Bowie at 8:00 a.m. on May 30.  After the run, we can gather at the cafe area in the Giant Food for coffee and bagels.
results.name: Memorial Day PGRC Running Meetup

results.description: "There's no wi-fi in the wilderness, but I assure you the connection is better." Who: We are cancer survivors, family, and friends, anyone affected by cancer who find learning, health, positivity, and camaraderie in a community of support. What: Hiking, kayaking, biking, sailing, environmental cleanup, and education events. When: Outings are usually week day evenings after work, and occasionally weekday mornings or weekends. Where: State and county parks in Maryland and DC. Why: We don't want to face cancer alone and know that the outdoors, exercise, and a community take us a long way in healing ourselves and others.
results.name: Fun Outdoor Activities With Other People Affected By Cancer

results.description: This group will consist of men and women coming out of a failed relationship looking for self care strategies that will move them in a positive direction. Whether you were in a narcissistic marriage now divorced; in an abusive relationship or just don't feel you can achieve anything - looking to go back to school, travel, or obtain self awareness and courage, this group is for you.
results.name: Upward One Self Love Support Group Meet up

topics.name: Learn Advanced Photoshop and Lightroom Techniques

results.description:
Think of digital photography as having two distinct phases. The first is everything you learn and do which culminates with the actual exposure(s) of the sensor to capture image data.  The second phase is everything you do after the exposure(s) to convert the image data into the best finished photograph you can make.  This second phase is widely known as "post processing" - formerly done in the "darkroom" -  is now mostly done on a computer using one or more software products to assist you in achieving the photograph you envisioned when you pressed the shutter button. 

This meetup group will focus almost exclusively on the post processing of digital images. We will explore the wide range of products, tools and techniques available to the digital photographer and artistic visionary. Together will we go on a journey of self-discovery, to unlock the creativity already hidden inside each of us, and encourage it to grow and flourish. 

If this sounds like something you'd be interested in exploring, then consider joining us! Even the longest and most difficult journey starts with a single step...
results.name: ImageCrafters of Maryland

results.description:
This is a meetup for those in the Carroll County area interested in playing tennis with one another and fostering new friendships. I said ages 21-30 because I am 25, and most meetups that say '20's and 30's' tend to be for people in their late 30's, so I wanted to focus the meetup a bit more on people closer to my age.

This is co ed, recreational tennis, but any skill level is welcomed. Some of the activities I was thinking of including are meetups at the local tennis courts in Westminster, MD (where I'm currently located). There are also tennis clinic sessions we can sign up for together at Carroll Tennis, where a tennis instructor guides you through playing and technique (it is about $20 per clinic, I believe).

Furthermore, it is also meant to be a social club. So, we can also get lunch or dinner afterwards and hang out somewhere nearby, such as Johansson's or O'Lordan's. This club is meant for those passionate about health, fitness, tennis, and fostering new friendships!
results.name: Carroll County Tennis Meetup Ages 21-30

results.description: This is a group for fun Couples who are interested in watching good TV shows, whether it is comedy, drama, horror, Thrillers or sports. Shows such as, but not limited to: Fear the Walking Dead,The Walking Dead, The Black List, Orange is the New BLack, Game of Thrones,Mr. Robot. Homeland, Bates Motel, Wayward Pines, Scandal, How to get away with Murder, The Catch, Empire,and Baseball, Basketball and Football games etc. We wanted a group to talk about and share opinions experiences about TV Shows. We started this group because we wanted to meet other TV enthusiasts like us/ We are looking forward to watching the TV shows with others and having viewing parties, whether it is indoors,outdoors, or at other venues.
results.name: TV Show Fanatics for Couples

results.description:
This group is intended for anyone interested in playing chess around the general Baltimore County area. I know there are a few groups that meet in the city, but I'm not a big fan of downtown traffic and parking, and it seems kind of silly to me to go through all of that and spend money just to play a simple board game with a few like-minded people.

I'm not the greatest chess player in the world, but it's one of the few board games that I remember how to play and I figure it would be a good icebreaker for people who would rather avoid the chaos of the bar scene or the pretentiousness of coffee shops. It's really just a way to have people sit across from each other and socialize -- and enjoy the game, too, of course.

I'm not completely against the idea of playing other board games, but I don't remember the rules to a whole lot of them. This group is also not for the "nerdy" games like Dungeons and Dragons. Nothing against that stuff, it's just not a subculture that I've ever delved into.

I live in Dundalk and would prefer to play games in parks or public spaces nearby, but Middle River, Rosedale, White Marsh, Parkville, etc. would be fine -- really, anywhere where parking is okay and there isn't a need to drive long distances or pay tolls, etc. I'd rather this be a more relaxed group with only a few people at a time meeting up to play.
results.name: Baltimore County Chess

results.description: To document evidence on the paranormal and to evaluate the "otherworld" to understand the importance and reasons using scientific protocols. Anyone can attend but beware, this is a real paranormal group. club initiation is required. meaning someone wanting to join has to go into a haunted site and document evidence by themselves, but don't worry, we will be there with you. Got the guts??
results.name: Ghost Bikers

results.description: Think you got skill? Prove it, every Monday, futsal at Sherwood Recreation center. Currently 15+ players come out to compete, friendly intense five minute one goal matches. Games are 5v5, bring a squad or come alone.
results.name: Futsal Monday

results.description:
A mastermind as defined by Napoleon Hill in Think and Grow Rich is: "Coordination of knowledge and effort, in a spirit of harmony, between two or more people, for the attainment of a definite purpose."

This is a group for people who seek to get their thoughts and ideas from inside their head and transform them into action. As a entrepreneur I have lots of ideas and visions but feel that to move forward I need my own "mastermind" group. So I realized that if I desire this others must too. This group is being formed with a vision of like minded people, or lets say individuals who truly want to make the world the best place and together we can help each other achieve our dreams. We can meet in a local coffee shop or restaurant in the Federal Hill area. Looking forward to meeting everyone and helping each other attain our "Definite Purpose". Also hoping as like minded people we will enjoy a few outings and happy hours too!
results.name: Baltimore MasterMinds Meetup

results.description:
Photography exhibits, workshops, lectures and social events are all part of the activities that contribute to this artistic community. We welcome you to be part of this community!

The group of creative artists is centered around The Cattail Studio and Gallery - a photography Gallery in Annapolis and a photography Studio in a rural waterfront setting on the Chesapeake Bay.  

The Gallery is located in the Design District, just 5 minutes from Annapolis City Dock and 45 minutes from Washington DC and Baltimore. 

The Studio is located in Southern Anne Arundel Country, on a waterfront property surrounded by 30 acres of woodlands and marshes, with a pier and boat (16' Boston Whaler) providing access to the many inlets and coves of the Chesapeake Bay. The Studio is a great location for those who want to have the option of either shooting indoors in a staged on-location setting with all the equipment in a regular studio, or with the assistance of the studio staff, visit nearby rural settings in the area. Overnight accommodations are also available for visitors. 

We look forward to seeing you at a future event!

Paulo
results.name: Chesapeake Bay PhotoWorks @The Cattail Studio and Gallery

results.description: This is a group for those interested in making connections with others who read and write poetry. I'm thinking we could meet twice a month to read and discuss poems we write ourselves and those we admire of other poets. It might be fun to meet at various venues around the city: cafes, coffee houses, libraries, and homes.
results.name: Baltimore Poetry Convergence

topics.name: Things to do on a BUDGET

results.description: Juniors, 13-16, who shoot below 90 and want to compete with other juniors.  We'll play in Montgomery County (MD) Public courses, and Blue Mash.   This would be a no-frills competition, no trophies, no tournament points.  We will try to keep the cost low by going to those with reasonable green fees, or have twilight,  or junior discount. Yes, there are tournaments out there, but most are in VA.
results.name: Competitive junior golfers (13-15) Meetup  -- No frills

results.description: The "All In For Autism" Association is a start up group seeking to provide support for families of children with ASD. We provide fun, safe and judgement free activities and resources for our children, as well as their family members. The "All In For Autism" Association also offers support, resource and information sharing sessions for  family members as well. COME JOIN US!!!
results.name: The "All In For Autism" Resource and Support Group

results.description: This group is for local healing arts practitioners, enthusiasts and curious spiritual seekers. We host FREE monthly Reiki Circles, monthly Usui Reiki Level I trainings, *Self-Care*Soul-Care*(TM) Healing & Empowerment retreats, Discussion groups, etc. For online discussion and resources, feel free to join us at http://bit.ly/HSW-Sanctuary.
results.name: Healing Spaces Wellness Sanctuary

results.description: We are a group of Healthcare professionals who want to inform and discuss with people all the small, easy things they can do that can make the biggest inpact on their life and health. How sometimes you can do a simple at home remedy, or simply change a thing or two in your diet, and cure health problems without having to take a pill or other medication everyday. The relationship with your doctor should be that of a friendship, not of a client-customer relationship. Let's get together with our peers interested in learning actionable health tips in a fun, social environment to discuss, educate and provide useful strategies for each other that will result in positive lifestyle changes .
results.name: Columbia Clarii Health Wellness Meetup

results.description: This group is for all families with children ages 6 weeks to 12 years old. We'll do Funcare™ for the kids and give parents the chance to have a kid-free night out or just get some things done around the house. We'll also have some fun with families together so that parents can get to know other parents in the community. Sometimes we'll do Funcare™ Outings with the older kids alone where kids will go on weekend and summer trips and have a blast with each other.
results.name: Funcare Baltimore/Howard County: Fun For the Whole Family!

results.description: The most beautiful part of the Sublime Attitude Meditation is that it helps us become so much more aware of our thoughts and how quickly they pass through who we are. They are like bits of dust passing through the vast openness of who we are. With practice and commitment this meditation can help one develop "transparent eyes"....the ability to see though thoughts rather than believe in them. Believing in our thoughts is what creates suffering. This meditation involves watching our breath and a japa...both with eyes open and closed. The beautiful part of this being one can practice it throughout the day and thus see clearly.
results.name: Baltimore Self-Improvement Meetup

results.description: This group is for serious women/men who are in need of an accountability partner. We will meet in local establishments or through conference calls to discuss our goals and devise action steps towards meeting our goals. We will help each other by holding each other accountable via phone/email, by being emotionally supportive when it gets hard and celebrating our victories together.
results.name: Accountability Partners In Action

results.description: Homestead Gardens is committed to building a community of gardeners devoted to preserving and protecting pollinators and their habitat through education, exploration, fun, science and adventure. Regardless of age, available space and gardening experience, anyone can BEE a Hero - learn how at FREE monthly meet-ups with experts on gardening for pollinators.
results.name: Homestead Gardens Pollinator Club Meetup

results.description: I have created a bootcamp session for the summer for individuals seeking a jumpstart to working out or that extra motivation or to get a killer workout. This bootcamp is catered to all levels. You can push yourself to the limit, or keep it consistent. Bootcamps are at local parks (centennial park, ellicott city), Severn Fields or Piney Orchard, Odenton MD. This bootcamps is not like others. Will focus on personal strengths and workouts are measurable and jamming out to workout music. Lets get moving!
results.name: Metronics fitness bootcamp

results.description: Olney Mill kids (8-10) can keep in touch over the summer through this meetup. I see a value of freeplay, where kids learn to be creative,socialize, self advocate, negotiate, and of course play! There will be a few soccer balls there, and a frisbee, if that's what they want.   Don't forget to bring water! For safety, parents should watch from afar, but should try refrain from over coaching. We will meet at Olney Mill Family Neighborhood Park  (19117 Willow Grove Road, Olney, MD 20832).   Times and dates are to be determined.
results.name: Olney Mill Kids Free-play Meetup!

topics.name: Living In The Way Of Jesus
Growing in Intimacy with Jesus Christ

results.description: People that want to come to know Christ as Savior and Lord, as well as people who have come to know Christ and want to grow in Christ in order to Go for Christ.
results.name: Owings Mills Reach Community Church

results.description: Calling all Agile enthusiasts to come and meet other folks who like adopting Agile in it's true form! Where we can discuss freely, beyond work limitations (finances, culture). I dream our group to be an environment of trust and openness without judgement. We could meet once a week. We could discuss new agile implementation ideas, anti-patterns, how we could overcome them or any Agile topic members are interested in discussing as long as everyone has an open mind and don't get stuck on their thought. It could be formal classroom style discussions or just a get together at a restaurant or bar to blow off some steam. Whatever the style of discussion we use, we'll make it a point that something useful comes out of it which we could use in our work or in our businesses and also it needs to be fun!
results.name: Truly Agile DCMDVA

results.description:
Seekers welcome here.
We are primarily concerned with how we should live- individually and collectively, so that we might become better people, parents, partners and citizens.
Our services may present material from thesim, religious humanism, ancient or modern myths.
Beneath the different methods of expression, we are united by shared values.
We host Sunday sermons, community based volunteer activities, book clubs and open mic nights, among other activities.
results.name: Unitarian Universalist of Fallston

results.description: We are a group that enjoys getting together at literary readings, art related talks/lectures, salons, and other art/lit/music relates events.
results.name: Arts and Literature Events in Howard County

results.description: Play tennis over the summer at Ellicott City public courts
results.name: Ellicott City Pick-up Tennis Meetup

results.description: Downtown Baltimore employees, locals and visitors that want to get out and walk around the Harbor for some daily exercise while networking.
results.name: Baltimore Inner Harbor Walk Meetup

results.description: The Northern Chesapeake Chapter of Modern Widows Club is an open group for women in widowhood of all ages, beliefs, backgrounds, and experiences. We seek to empower, support and encourage widows to live fully. Informal socializing, directed discussions, lite refreshments.
results.name: Modern Widows Club -- Northern Chesapeake

results.description: Do you like watching or playing sports? Do you like being social and making new friends? If so, this group is for you! Everyone is welcome to join. I started this Meetup Group because I couldn't find another Meetup Group in Annapolis or nearby that catered to people who enjoy sports. Looking forward to having everyone make some new friends while also, hopefully, enjoying some fun/memorable sporting events!
results.name: Annapolis Sports and Socials Meetup

results.description:
Pick-up indoor volleyball on Friday nights at the Greenbelt Community Center. All levels welcome! RSVP needed to help ensure we have enough players to rent a court.

We start at 6 and have the gym reserved through 7:30, however, if we have enough participants, we can rent the gym for a longer period of time. 

$6 (cash only) at the door. 

Looking forward to meeting you on the court!
results.name: Greenbelt Volleyball Meetup

topics.name: Exercise and Have Fun at the same time

results.description: If you are tired of the treadmill and looking for a FUN way to stay FIT and Healthy, it might be time to KICK UP your heels ! Join Maryland Square Dancing. Mason/Dixon Square Dancers Federation is a non-profit group of currently 14 Clubs dancing throughout the State of Maryland. There are several instructional Cluns currently seeking new students for the September classes. In addition, the Federation also has Rounds (pre-corographed ballroom dancing) and Line Dancing at some locations. Please check the website for Club schedule dances, Caller, Cuer, and other special events. We are 357 members and growing. Square Dancing is the Maryland State Folk Dance. COME DANCE WITH US !
results.name: Mason/Dixon Square Dancers Federation - Annapolis Area

results.description: The purpose of this group is to bring lesbian women together particularly dominant, studs and women on the masculine side of the spectrum. The idea is get together socially and provide a safe space to create friendships. I have noticed it can be difficult to meet due to shyness, aniexty and even some people feel the need to compete when femmes are around. We have meet-ups where we have workout sessions, sporting events, go to lgbt events, poetry slams, and are open to any events our members come up with. We can also have meet ups where we can just have discussions about topics we are interested in. The idea is to support one another so of anyone is on a team and has a game or performing somewhere we could make that an event as well.
results.name: No Femmes Allowed

topics.name: Tabletop Role Playing and Board Games

results.description:
We're hosting a board games evening with newer classics from Carcassonne and Agricola to older favorites like Yahtzee and RackO. Games are played in the parish house of St. Barnabas Episcopal Church, 13135 Forsythe Road, Sykesville. We'll provide pizza or subs for dinner; donations are always welcome. Our two children will be attending and other kids who play board games are welcome to join us. Please bring a favorite game if you're looking to teach a new crew how to play. Everyone is welcome regardless of experience level. (Although if you beat Shane too many times, you may be asked to leave.)

Look forward to meeting you,
Shane & Christy Yeager
results.name: 2nd Saturday Sykesville Board Games

results.description: Busy women who are looking for accountability and networking as we work toward reaching our business goals.
results.name: Women of Central MD Entrepreneur Accountability Meetup

results.description:
Do you hate purchasing a bottle of wine without tasting it first? Would you like to be more adventurous in your wine selection but do not want to waste money on wines you do not like?

If you would like to learn more about wines without breaking the bank, then this meet up group is for you. The Wine Experience is partnered with the Boisset Wine Collection (a portfolio of over 20 wineries in 4 countries) to bring The Wine Experience to everyone through private wine tastings. Our wine tastings are a fantastic way to treat your family and friends to a guided wine experience, allowing them to taste the wines before making their selections, which will be delivered to their front door. If you would like to meet up with like minded wine lovers, or if you would like to try our guided wine experience before booking your own event for your family and friends, then attend one of our meet ups, or attend regularly as the wine tasting experiences change.

Think of this as a wine co-operative. The cost of a wine tasting experience will be divided among Meet Up members who RSVP at least 2 weeks before the event, not to exceed $15. The wine tasting will consist of wines from various wineries, such as Raymond Vineyards, Buena Vista Winery, Lockwood Vineyards, De Loach Vineyards, just to name a few.

Locations for these events may be a group members home, or a larger venue. Light food pairings will be at each event.

THE COST IS NOT ADMISSION. IT IS A DIVISION OF A WINE PURCHASE AMONG THIS MEET UP GROUP'S MEMBERS. YOU CANNOT NOT PAY AT THE EVENT. THERE WILL BE A VERY STRICT GUEST LIST FOR THESE PRIVATE EVENTS! ANYONE NOT ON THE GUEST LIST MAY NOT ENTER THE EVENT.

There is NO OBLIGATION to purchase wine at these private events, although order forms will be available.

The goal is to bring Odenton wine lover's together in a very cost affordable way. Each event's cost will be calculated and divided among the members, with the projection that at least 12 people will attend. Meet Up's WePay will be used to collect each member's contribution. No one will be charged more than the projected amount. That is the way to secure your entrance into this private event.
results.name: The Wine Experience Odenton Meetup

results.description: My idea RIGHT NOW is to start with a monthly theme and have a book club which meets monthly, which will also meet monthly for writers critique, which will also meet now and then for a smattering of impromptu get-togethers, which may have something or nothing to do with anything else we do. It's lagniappe, a little extra, all related to the monthly theme. As for people who should join? My vision is to meet with groups of people who love talking in circles about shit they love or don't love, and also listen closely- writers, readers, talkers and listeners I guess.
results.name: Lagniappe Book and Writing Club

results.description:
This is a fitness group for women of all fitness levels - let's burn calories and have fun while following a safe and effective workout routine led by a certified personal trainer.

 I started this group because I am passionate about helping women get in shape and have fun while doing it!  Fitness is fun when you work out with friends who will support you and hold you accountable.  I also believe fitness should be affordable and group sessions are much more reasonable than 1:1 training sessions.
results.name: FitCamp - Have fun and get fit!

results.description:
We host classes and seminars on MMA, Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu, Muay Thai, Boxing and kickboxing for people of all ages. Ground Control is the largest and most recognized mixed martial arts academy in Maryland. At Ground Control, people of all ages and fitness levels work as a team to achieve their goals in physical and mental excellence through martial arts and fitness. Ground Control’s family of professors, coaches, and trainers are constantly working together to help members reach their fitness goals as a team. We train like we are family! Everyone is here to help and encourage each other to set and achieve their goals. It does not matter if you just want to come in, have fun, and relieve the stress that life brings your way, or if your goal is to lose 20 lbs., Ground Control will get you there. Parents can participate in a martial arts class or a fitness class, while their kids work on developing confidence and discipline in our Brazilian jiu-jitsu program.

At Ground Control, it really does not matter who you are, how old you are, or what your ultimate goals are, we can help get you there. Do you want to train to be a Brazilian jiu-jitsu world champion, professional fighter, or just have a ton of fun? Come try our academy out for free! There are no obligations or pushy sales people – just a team that will help you reach mental and physical achievements beyond anything you though possible. Come join our family and be part of something amazing!
results.name: Mixed Martial Arts - Ground Control
